short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert telephone numbers into clickable links so you can dial them with your VoIP service

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically converts plain text telephone numbers in Netsuite CRM into clickable links so that you can easily click to call the number via your browser's default handler for HREF="TEL:" links.
